p: Currently, several big pharmaceutical companies are pursuing the treatment and prevention of the novel coronavirus. However, aside from remdesivir created by Genentech, we do not have a promising drug for COVID-19 treatment. Thus, when chloroquine appeared as a hope, it sparked the interest of the media as a potential cure.
